body:
Abraham,

I am not sure exactly what the problem is but my initial instinct is that it relates to the new Radiance release and the updates that Mostapha just pushed 2 days ago:

[http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/update-to-r...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/update-to-radiance-4-3-a-1-before-it-gets-really-cold)

-Chris
